query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    BA.TOWER,
    BA.[LEVEL],
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    BA.FLAT,
    'Balcony Area' as Sclicer,
    BA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN BA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE BA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    BA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    BA.CATEGORY,
    BA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM (
     SELECT BR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
             BR.PROJECT_ID,
             BR.TOWER,
             BR.[LEVEL],
             BR.FLAT,
             COLUMN_NAME.*,
             BM.ACTIVITY_ID,
             BM.SBU_ID,
             BM.CATEGORY,
             DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID,BM.SBU_ID ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) AS DRANK
         FROM [STG].[O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_RAW_STG] BR
         CROSS APPLY  (
               SELECT        [MARKING_FOR_RAIN_WATER_PIPE] , 'MARKING FOR RAIN WATER PIPE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [RAIN_WATER_PIPE] , 'RAIN WATER PIPE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [RAIN_WATER_PIPE_PACKING] , 'RAIN WATER PIPE PACKING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_BLOCKWORK] , 'BALCONY BLOCKWORK'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_PLASTER] , 'BALCONY PLASTER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [F_CHANNEL_INSTALLATION] , 'F CHANNEL INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [NON_SHRINK_GROUT] , 'NON SHRINK GROUT'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [TOP_RAIL_BRACKET_INSTALLATION] , 'TOP RAIL BRACKET INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [EIFS_INSTALLATION] , 'EIFS INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_EIFS_PLASTER] , 'BALCONY EIFS PLASTER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [GRINDING_CLEARANCE] , 'GRINDING CLEARANCE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [CEILING_SKIM_COAT_AND_PRIMER] , 'CEILING SKIM COAT & PRIMER'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SCREED] , 'BALCONY SCREED'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [DRAIN_FIXING] , 'DRAIN FIXING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [CEILING_BALCONY_BOX_INSTALLATION] , 'CEILING BALCONY BOX INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [LEFT_OVER_SCREED_IF_ANY] , 'LEFT OVER SCREED (IF ANY)'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [EIFS_WALL_TEXTURE] , 'EIFS WALL TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_GLASS_INSTALLATION] , 'BALUSTRADE GLASS INSTALLATION'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_TOP_RAIL] , 'BALUSTRADE TOP RAIL'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_UNDER_TILE_WATER_PROOFING] , 'BALCONY UNDER TILE WATER PROOFING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_FLOOR_TILING] , 'BALCONY FLOOR TILING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALUSTRADE_INTERNAL_FLASHING] , 'BALUSTRADE - INTERNAL FLASHING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SKIRTING] , 'BALCONY SKIRTING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [METAL_CEILING] , 'METAL CEILING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_CEILING_TEXTURE] , 'BALCONY CEILING TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COMPLETE_WALL_TEXTURE] , 'COMPLETE WALL TEXTURE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_GROUTING] , 'BALCONY GROUTING'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_SILICONE] , 'BALCONY SILICONE'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES] , 'BALCONY MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_FINAL_COAT_PAINT] , 'BALCONY FINAL COAT PAINT'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [BALCONY_DRAIN_COVER_SUPPLY] , 'BALCONY DRAIN COVER SUPPLY'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COVER_FIXING_FOR_BALCONY_DRAIN] , 'COVER FIXING FOR BALCONY DRAIN'
     UNION ALL SELECT  [COVER_PLATE_BW_ACP_AND_EIFS] , 'COVER PLATE B/W ACP & EIFS'
             ) AS COLUMN_NAME (VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
               
     left JOIN  STG.O_PLN_BALCONYAREA_MAP_STG  BM
     ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = BM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
     WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL  AND VALUE !='') BA
Left JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          BA.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         BA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          BA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          BA.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
     P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
     PF.Upload_Date,
     --PF.project_id,
     PF.tower,
     --PF.sbu_id,
     PF.[Type],
     PF.SBU,
     PF.SBU_Custom_Sort,
     PF.[Month],
     
     PF.ORDER_Month,
     PF.[value],
     SUM(convert(int ,value)) OVER(PARTITION BY PF.project_id,PF.[Type],PF.SBU_Custom_Sort ORDER BY PF.ORDER_Month ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS Cummulative 
FROM (
SELECT
                Upload_Date,
                project_id,tower,sbu_id,
                [Type],
                SBU,
                    SBU_Custom_Sort,
                    [Month],
                CASE
                WHEN TRIM([Month]) IN ('Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)') THEN null
                ELSE REPLACE(FORMAT(CAST(concat('01-',TRIM([Month])) AS DATE),'yyyy-MM'),'-','')
                 END AS ORDER_Month,
                CAST(value AS DECIMAL(25,2)) AS [value]
                    
FROM (
SELECT
        CAST(upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_date,
        project_id,
        tower,
        sbu_id,
        [Type],
        SBU,
          CASE
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 1' THEN 1
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 2' THEN 2
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 3' THEN 3
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 4' THEN 4
                    WHEN SBU = 'SBU 5' THEN 5
                    ELSE 6
                END AS SBU_Custom_Sort,
        Column_Name.[Month],
        CASE 
            WHEN CAST(ISNULL(TRIM(Column_Name.VALUE ),'') AS VARCHAR(100))  IN ('',' ','-')  AND [Type] = 'Plan'  THEN ISNULL(REPLACE('0',',',''),'0.00')
            ELSE ISNULL(REPLACE(CAST(Column_Name.VALUE AS VARCHAR(100)),',',''),'0.00') 
        END  AS Value
          ,DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY project_id ORDER BY CAST(upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS [DENSE_RANK]
        FROM STG.O_PLN_BUSINESS_PLAN_RAW_STG
        cross apply (
                                     SELECT Jan_22 ,  'Jan-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Feb_22 ,  'Feb-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Mar_22 ,  'Mar-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Apr_22 ,  'Apr-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT May_22 ,  'May-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Jun_22 ,  'Jun-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Jul_22 ,  'Jul-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Aug_22 ,  'Aug-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Sep_22 ,  'Sep-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Oct_22 ,  'Oct-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Nov_22 ,  'Nov-22'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dec_22 ,  'Dec-22'
        )as Column_Name(value,[Month])
        WHERE
         TRIM(value) NOT IN ('Jan-22','Feb-22','Mar-22','Apr-22','May-22','Jun-22','Jul-22','Aug-22','Sep-22','Oct-22','Nov-22','Dec-22') AND
         TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')
    ) PF1
     WHERE TRIM(value) NOT IN ('','-',' ')
   AND TRIM(SBU) NOT IN ('',' ','Cumulative','%','Total Revenue (BOQ)','Achieved Revenue (Till 2021)','Overall')
   AND  [DENSE_RANK] = 1 
       ) PF 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          PF.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          PF.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
      
     ',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    A.TOWER    ,
     A.Activity_Id,
     P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
     A.LEVEL,
     'Corridor' as Scilicer,
  
  CAST(REPLACE(CASE     WHEN TRIM(A.value) IN ('','NA') THEN '0%' else TRIM(A.value) end, '%', '') AS Decimal)/100 AS value,

    A.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    A.CATEGORY   ,

          CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('BUILDERS WORK') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('MEP') THEN  12
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('PLASTER') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('SCREED') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('TILE') THEN  9
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('MARBLE') THEN  10
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('FACADE') THEN  11
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('GYAUM') THEN  6
            WHEN TRIM(A.CATEGORY) IN('PAINT') THEN  8
            ELSE 20
        END AS CATEGORY_SORT,
    A.UPLOAD_DATE  
         
FROM
(
        SELECT CAST(O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.PROJECT_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.TOWER,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW.LEVEL,
     COLUMN_NAME.* ,
        'CORRIDOR' AS SCLICER,
       
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.ACTIVITY_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.SBU_ID,
        O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.CATEGORY,

        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID , SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC
                            )     PROJECT_UDATE_DRANK
 FROM [STG].[O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW_STG]  O_PLN_CORRIDOR_RAW
CROSS APPLY (

SELECT     CORRIDOR_MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK     ,     'Corridor MEP Marking for Builders Work'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK     ,    'Corridor Cutting & Chasing of Blockwork'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION     ,     'Corridor MEP Services Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING     ,     'Corridor Wall MEP Services Packing'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_PLASTER     ,     'Corridor Plaster'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_SCREED     ,     'Corridor Screed'
UNION ALL SELECT GRINDING_CLEARANCE_FOR_TILE     ,     'Grinding Clearance for Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT TILE_MARKING     ,    'Tile Marking'
UNION ALL SELECT BULL_MARKING     ,     'Bull Marking'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRICAL_CONDUITS     ,     'Electrical Conduits'
UNION ALL SELECT COLD_WATER_SUPPLY     ,     'Cold water supply'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_FIGHTING_PIPE_SUPPORT     ,     'Fire Fighting Pipe Support'
UNION ALL SELECT MODULAR_INSTALATION     ,    'Modular Instalation'
UNION ALL SELECT FRAMING_CLEARANCE_BY_MEP     ,     'Framing Clearance by MEP'
UNION ALL SELECT CENTER_LINE_MARKING_FOR_FACADE_INSTALLATION     ,     'Center line marking for Facade Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_BOX_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Box Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_FRAME_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Frame Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_GLASS_INSTALLATION     ,     'Corridor Curtain Wall Glass Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CURTAIN_WALL_FLASHING_INSTALLATION     ,    'Corridor Curtain Wall Flashing Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FLOOR_TILE     ,    'Corridor Floor Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_WALL_TILE     ,          'Corridor Wall Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_HOSE_REEL_CABINET_INSTALLATION     ,     'Fire Hose Reel Cabinet Installation'
UNION ALL SELECT GROUTING_FOR_FRAMING_CLEARANCE     ,     'Grouting for Framing Clearance'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FC_FRAMING     ,     'Corridor FC Framing'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_ACCESS_PANEL_MARKINGS_AND_INSPECTION     ,     'MEP Access Panel Markings & Inspection'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_WORKS_FOR_BOARDING_CLEARANCE     ,    'MEP Works for Boarding Clearance '
UNION ALL SELECT FRAMING_LEVELLING     ,     'Framing Levelling'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FC_BOARDING     ,     'Corridor FC Boarding'
UNION ALL SELECT JOINT_TAPING_AND_SANDING     ,    'Joint Taping & Sanding'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_PRIMER     ,     'Corridor Ceiling Primer'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT     ,     'Corridor Ceiling Stucco (1st and 2nd Coat)'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT     ,    'Corridor Ceiling First Coat Paint'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_GROUTING     ,     'Corridor Grouting'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_SILICONE     ,     'Corridor Silicone'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_SCREED     ,    'Left over Screed'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_AREA_FLOOR_TILE     ,    'Left Over Area Floor Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT LEFT_OVER_AREA_WALL_TILE     ,    'Left Over Area Wall Tile'
UNION ALL SELECT REMAINING_GROUT_AND_SILICONE_WORKS     ,     'Remaining Grout and Silicone Works'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES     ,    'Corridor MEP Final Fixtures'
UNION ALL SELECT CORRIDOR_FINAL_COAT_PAINT     ,    'Corridor Final Coat Paint'          
)AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
   JOIN [STG].[O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP_STG]  O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP
    ON TRIM(COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK) = TRIM(O_PLN_CORRIDOR_MAP.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE)
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL) A
   
   INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM]  LM
     ON          A.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          A.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          A.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          A.PROJECT_UDATE_DRANK = 1
',

query: 'SELECT      
    P.PROJECT_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    A.Upload_Time AS Upload_Date,
    A.Reference_Number,
    A.PR_PO_Other_Ref_No, 
    --A.SBU_SCLICER, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Pending_With,
    A.Issue_Description,
    A.Current_Status,
    A.Impact_On,
    A.Status,
    A.Project,
    --A.citprojectid, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Tower,
    --A.Project_Identifier, --we need to Join and get sbu_ID from [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] PowerBI
    A.Raised_On,
    A.Actual_Closure_Date,
    A.Target_Closure_Date,
    A.Ageing,
    CASE 
        WHEN A.Ageing <=7  THEN  '(0-7)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 14 THEN '(8-14)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 21 THEN '(15-21)'
        WHEN A.Ageing <= 30 THEN '(22-30)'
        WHEN A.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE '>30' END AS Agetub,
    CASE 
        WHEN A.Ageing <=7  THEN 1
        WHEN A.Ageing <=14 THEN 2
        WHEN A.Ageing <=21 THEN 3
        WHEN A.Ageing <=30 THEN 4
        WHEN A.Ageing IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE 5     END AS Agetub_sort
FROM(
        SELECT 
                AC.*,
                CASE 
                    WHEN TRIM(LOWER(AC.Status)) = 'open' AND ISNULL(AC.Raised_On,'') <> '' THEN DATEDIFF(day,CAST(substring( AC.Raised_On,charindex('/',AC.Raised_On)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Raised_On,2)+'/'+right(AC.Raised_On,4) AS DATE ),GETDATE())
                    WHEN TRIM(LOWER(AC.Status)) = 'closed' AND ISNULL(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,'') <> '' AND ISNULL(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,'') like ('%/%') AND ISNULL(AC.Raised_On,'') <> '' 
                        THEN  DATEDIFF(day,cast(substring( AC.Raised_On,charindex('/',AC.Raised_On)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Raised_On,2)+'/'+right(AC.Raised_On,4) as date),cast(substring( AC.Actual_Closure_Date,charindex('/',AC.Actual_Closure_Date)+1,2)+'/'+ left(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,2)+'/'+right(AC.Actual_Closure_Date,4) as date))
                ELSE NULL END AS Ageing        
        FROM(
            SELECT      
                CAST(upload_time as DATE)  Upload_Time,
                CI.Reference_Number,
                CI.PR_PO_Other_Ref_No,
                CASE
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 1%' THEN 'SBU 1'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 2%' THEN 'SBU 2'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 3%' THEN 'SBU 3'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 4%' THEN 'SBU 4'
                    WHEN CI.SBU_Issue_Raised_by LIKE '%SBU 5%' THEN 'SBU 5'
                    ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS SBU_SCLICER,
                CASE
                    WHEN CI.Pending_With IS NULL OR TRIM(CI.Pending_With) = '' THEN 'Not Available'
                    ELSE CI.Pending_With
                    END AS Pending_With,
                CI.Issue_Description,
                CI.Current_Status,
                CI.Impact_On,
                CI.Status,
                CI.Project,
                CI.Project_id as CITPROJECTID,
                PS.Project_id,
                PS.Project_Identifier,
                CI.Sbu_ID,
                CI.Tower,
                --CI.Raised_On,
                --CI.Target_Closure_Date,
                --CI.Actual_Closure_Date
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Raised_On IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(CI.Raised_On) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.raised_on like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.raised_on as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.raised_on  end AS Raised_On,
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Actual_Closure_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(CI.Actual_Closure_Date) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.Actual_Closure_Date like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.Actual_Closure_Date as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.Actual_Closure_Date  end AS Actual_Closure_Date,
                CASE 
                    WHEN CI.Target_Closure_Date IS NOT NULL AND TRIM( CI.Target_Closure_Date) NOT IN ('','-')  and CI.Target_Closure_Date like '%-%' then format(cast(CI.Target_Closure_Date as date),'dd/MM/yyyy')  
                    else CI.Target_Closure_Date  end AS Target_Closure_Date
            FROM
                        STG.O_PLN_CRITICAL_ISSUE_TRACKER_STG CI
            LEFT JOIN    STG.PROJECTS_STG AS PS 
                ON        CI.Project_id = PS.Project_identifier
                    --need to understand from where this project_short came.
            WHERE        TRIM(CI.Issue_Description) NOT IN ('')) AC
        )A
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_PROJECTS_DIM] P
    ON      A.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      A.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER',

query: 'SELECT
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    DA.TOWER,
    DA.[LEVEL],
    DA.FLAT,
    'Dry Area' as Sclicer,
     DA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN DA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE DA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    DA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    DA.CATEGORY,
     DA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM(
     SELECT
            DR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
            DR.PROJECT_ID,
            DR.TOWER,
            DR.[LEVEL],
            DR.FLAT,
            COLUMN_NAME.*,
            DM.ACTIVITY_ID,
            DM.SBU_ID,
            DM.CATEGORY,
            DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID , DM.SBU_ID ORDER BY  Convert(Date,UPLOAD_TIME) DESC ) AS DRANK
     FROM [STG].[O_PLN_DRYAREA_RAW_STG] DR
     CROSS APPLY(
                      SELECT  [HSE_CLEARANCE_FOR_DESHUTTERING],'HSE CLEARANCE FOR DESHUTTERING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_RISER_WORKS],'MEP RISER WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [LPG_PIPE],'LPG PIPE'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_LAYOUT_MARKING],'BLOCKWORK LAYOUT MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_FIRST_LAYER],'BLOCKWORK FIRST LAYER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_WITH_1MTR_MARKING],'BLOCKWORK WITH 1MTR MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [GI_LINTEL],'GI LINTEL'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [RCC_LINTEL_STIFFENER] ,'RCC LINTEL / STIFFENER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ABOVE_LINTEL_BLOCK_WORK],'ABOVE LINTEL BLOCK WORK'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [HEAD_RESTRAINTS_INSTALLATION],'HEAD RESTRAINTS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS_AND_PU_FOAM_WORKS],'FIRE SEALANT WORKS & PU FOAM WORKS'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_MARKING_FOR_HL_BUILDERS_WORK],'MEP MARKING FOR HL BUILDERS WORK'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BLOCKWORK_CUTTING_FOR_MEP_SERVICES] ,'BLOCKWORK CUTTING FOR MEP SERVICES'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_WALL_MARKING_FOR_CUTTING_AND_CHASING],'MEP WALL MARKING FOR CUTTING & CHASING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [BULL_MARKING_FOR_PLASTER],'BULL MARKING FOR PLASTER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [SUB_FRAME],'SUB FRAME'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CORNER_BEAD_FIXING],'CORNER BEAD FIXING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CUTTING_AND_CHASING],'CUTTING & CHASING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [MEP_PLASTERING_CLEARANCE_BOX_FIXING_AND_PIPE_SETTING], 'MEP PLASTERING CLEARANCE (BOX FIXING & PIPE SETTING)'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ONU_DB_AND_ALL_MEP_WORKS_INSTALLATION],'ONU, DB & ALL MEP WORKS INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [ONU_DB_AND_ALL_MEP_WORKS_PACKING],'ONU, DB & ALL MEP WORKS PACKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [DRY_AREA_PLASTER],'DRY AREA PLASTER'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [PLASTERING_CLEARANCE_WITH_1_METER_MARKING], 'PLASTERING CLEARANCE WITH 1 METER MARKING'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [CENTER_LINE_MARKING_FOR_FACADE_INSTALLATION], 'CENTER LINE MARKING FOR FACADE INSTALLATION'
          UNION ALL SELECT  [UCW_STARTER_GUTTER],'UCW-STARTER GUTTER'

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
    E.TOWER    ,
    E.LEVEL,
    'Electrical Room' as Sclicer,
    E.ACTIVITY_ID    ,
    CASE 
        WHEN E.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE E.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    E.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    E.CATEGORY   ,
    E.UPLOAD_DATE  
FROM (
SELECT ER.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
ER.PROJECT_ID,
ER.TOWER,
ER.LEVEL,
COLUMN_NAME.*,
EM.ACTIVITY_ID,
EM.SBU_ID,
EM.CATEGORY,
DENSE_RANK () OVER(PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
FROM STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_RAW_STG ER
 CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT BLOCKWORK_LAYOUT,'BLOCKWORK LAYOUT'
UNION ALL SELECT BLOCKWORK,'BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK,'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK,'CUTTING AND CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION,'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING,'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT PLASTER,'PLASTER'
UNION ALL SELECT SCREED,'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_AND_CEILING_PRIMER,'WALL AND CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT WALL_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT,'WALL STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'

UNION ALL SELECT METER_BOARD_PAINTING,'METER BOARD PAINTING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_CABLE_TRAY_AND_TRUNKING,'INSTALLATION OF CABLE TRAY AND TRUNKING'
UNION ALL SELECT INSTALLATION_OF_PANELS,'INSTALLATION OF PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT CABLE_LAYING_AND_GLANDING_WORKS,'CABLE LAYING AND GLANDING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT DRESSING_AND_TERMINATION_OF_SMDB_AND_PANELS,'DRESSING AND TERMINATION OF SMDB AND PANELS'
UNION ALL SELECT BUS_BAR_WITH_TAP_OFF_BOX_COMPLETION,'BUS BAR WITH TAP OFF BOX COMPLETION'
UNION ALL SELECT THRESHOLD,'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT FLOOR_TILE,'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION,'DOOR FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION,'DOOR ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION,'DOOR SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION,'DOOR IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT DOOR_SILICONE,'DOOR SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_GRINDING,'EPOXY ERINDING'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_BUG_FILL,'EPOXY BUG FILL'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_PRIMER,'EPOXY PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FIRST_COAT,'EPOXY FIRST COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT EPOXY_FINAL_COAT,'EPOXY FINAL COAT'
UNION ALL SELECT SKIRTING,'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT POP_WORKS,'POP WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRICAL_ROOM_TOP_BOARDING,'ELECTRICAL ROOM TOP BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT FIRE_SEALANT_WORKS,'FIRE SEALANT WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT ANGLE_FIXING,'ANGLE FIXING'
UNION ALL SELECT SHAFT_BOARDING,'SHAFT BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT GROUTING,'EROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT SILICONE,'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT SIGNAGE,'SIGNAGE'
UNION ALL SELECT MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES,'MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
UNION ALL SELECT ELECTRIC_METER_INSTALLATION,'ELECTRIC METER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT FINAL_COAT_PAINT,'FINAL COAT PAINT'
)AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
left JOIN STG.O_PLN_ELECTRICALROOM_MAP_STG EM
ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = EM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
) E
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          E.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM]P
      ON          E.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          E.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          E.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    F.TOWER,
    F.ACTIVITY_ID,
    F.Level,
    'Fire Lift Lobby' as Sclicer,
    CASE 
        WHEN F.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE F.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    F.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    F.CATEGORY,
    F.UPLOAD_DATE
     from (
        SELECT CAST(FR.upload_time as DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        FR.project_id,
        FR.tower,
        FR.Level,
        Column_Name.*,
        FM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        FM.SBU_ID,
        FM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  project_id , FM.SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(upload_time as DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_FIRELIFTLOBBY_RAW_STG FR
    CROSS apply (
                        SELECT    MEP_Marking_for_Builders_Work    ,    'MEP Marking for Builders Work'

query: ' SELECT  
 A.Update_Date,
P.Sort_ID as Project_ID,
P.Project_Identifier,
OLMA.Level_MAP_ID AS Level_ID,
A.Sbu_Id,
 A.Tower,
 A.Sclicer,
 A.Flat,
 A.Level,
 TRY_CAST(REPLACE(A.value,'%','') AS DECIMAL)/100 AS value,
 A.Type_of_work,
 A.Activity_ID,
 A.Category,
               CASE 
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('MEP') THEN 1
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Blockwork') THEN 2
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Plaster') THEN 3
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Builders Work') THEN 4
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Facade') THEN 5
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Tile') THEN 6
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Screed') THEN 7
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Paint') THEN 8
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Gypsum') THEN 9
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Marble') THEN 10
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Silicone') THEN 11
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Joinery') THEN 12
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('SBU1') THEN 13
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Waterproofing') THEN 14
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Faade') THEN 15
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('EIFS') THEN 16
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('SFD') THEN 17
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Water Proofing') THEN 18
 WHEN TRIM(Category) = ('Appliances') THEN 19
       END AS Category_Sort ,
       CONCAT(A.ACTIVITY_ID,' ', A.Type_of_work) AS Sort_Type_Of_Work 
 
from(          
          SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_DRYAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_WETAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT * FROM [DWH].[PLN_BALCONYAREA_FACT]
 UNION ALL
 SELECT  * FROM [DWH].[PLN_KITCHENAREA_FACT]
          ) A
LEFT JOIN   [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] OLMA
               ON A.Level_ID = OLMA.[Level_Map_ID]
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
  ON  A.PROJECT_ID=P.Sort_ID


















',

    CASE 
        WHEN GAR.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE GAR.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    GAR.TYPE_OF_WORK    ,
    GAR.CATEGORY   ,
     GAR.UPLOAD_DATE  
   
FROM 

(
        SELECT CAST(GR.UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
        GR.PROJECT_ID,
        GR.TOWER,
        GR.LEVEL,
        COLUMN_NAME.*,
        GM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        GM.SBU_ID,
        GM.CATEGORY,
        DENSE_RANK () OVER     (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID ,GM.SBU_ID
                            ORDER BY  CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC
                            )     DRANK
    FROM STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_RAW_STG  GR
    CROSS APPLY  (
         SELECT    [OUTER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'OUTER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GARBAGE_CHUTE_WORKS]     ,  'GARBAGE CHUTE WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PIPING_WORKS]     ,  'MEP PIPING WORKS'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_PRESSURE_TEST_AND_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP PRESSURE TEST & CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [INNER_WALL_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'INNER WALL BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_MARKING_FOR_BUILDERS_WORK]     ,  'MEP MARKING FOR BUILDERS WORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CUTTING_AND_CHASING_OF_BLOCKWORK]     ,  'CUTTING & CHASING OF BLOCKWORK'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_SERVICES_INSTALLATION]     ,  'MEP SERVICES INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_MEP_SERVICES_PACKING]     ,  'WALL MEP SERVICES PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [PLASTER]     ,  'PLASTER'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CORE_CUTTING_AND_CHIPPING]     ,  'CORE CUTTING & CHIPPING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_SLEEVE_INSTALLATION]     ,  'MEP SLEEVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [BORE_PACKING]     ,  'BORE PACKING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [UNDER_SCREED_WATER_PROOFING]     ,  'UNDER SCREED WATER PROOFING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SCREED]     ,  'SCREED'
UNION ALL SELECT   [WALL_TILE]     ,  'WALL TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_FRAMING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP FRAMING CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FALSE_CEILING_FRAMING]     ,  'FALSE CEILING FRAMING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_BOARDING_CLEARANCE]     ,  'MEP BOARDING CLEARANCE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FALSE_CEILING_BOARDING]     ,  'FALSE CEILING BOARDING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_PRIMER]     ,  'CEILING PRIMER'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_STUCCO_1ST_AND_2ND_COAT]     ,  'CEILING STUCCO (1ST AND 2ND COAT)'
UNION ALL SELECT   [CEILING_FIRST_COAT_PAINT]     ,  'CEILING FIRST COAT PAINT'
UNION ALL SELECT   [UNDER_TILE_WATER_PROOFING]     ,  'UNDER TILE WATER PROOFING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [THRESHOLD]     ,  'THRESHOLD'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FLOOR_TILE]     ,  'FLOOR TILE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SKIRTING]     ,  'SKIRTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [GROUTING]     ,  'GROUTING'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SILICONE]     ,  'SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [HOPPER_DOOR]     ,  'HOPPER DOOR'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_FRAME_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-FRAME INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_ARCHITRAVE_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-ARCHITRAVE INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SHUTTER_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-SHUTTER INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_IRONMONGERY_INSTALLATION]     ,  'DOOR-IRONMONGERY INSTALLATION'
UNION ALL SELECT   [DOOR_SILICONE]     ,  'DOOR-SILICONE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [SIGNAGE]     ,  'SIGNAGE'
UNION ALL SELECT   [MEP_FINAL_FIXTURES]     ,  'MEP FINAL FIXTURES'
UNION ALL SELECT   [FINAL_COAT_PAINT]     ,  'FINAL COAT PAINT'

                        )AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
    INNER JOIN STG.O_PLN_GARBAGEROOM_MAP_STG  GM
    ON COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = GM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
    WHERE VALUE IS NOT NULL
     ) GAR
INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          GAR.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          GAR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          GAR.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          GAR.DRANK = 1',

query: 'select
        Upload_Date,
        P.Sort_ID AS Project_ID,
        SM.SBU_Map_ID AS Sbu_ID,
        LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS Level_ID,
        KO.Tower,
        P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
        KO.Flat,
        KO.Level,
        KO.Type_of_work,
        KO.Category,
        KO.Activity_ID,
       Format(cast(NULLIF(KO.Value,'') AS DATE ),'dd-MM-yyy')AS Real_Value,
        CASE
            WHEN TRIM(KO.value) IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 0
            WHEN KO.value IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(KO.value) NOT IN ('','-','0%','00%') THEN 1
            ELSE 0
        END AS value,
        
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Paint') THEN  1
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Facade') THEN  2
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('MEP') THEN  3
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('PMT') THEN  4
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Consultant') THEN  5
            WHEN TRIM(KO.Category) IN('Client') THEN  6
            ELSE 20
        END AS Category_Sort
    FROM (
    SELECT
        cast(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) AS Upload_Date,
        OPKOR.project_id,
        OPKOR.tower,
        OPKOR.sbu_id ,
        OPKOR.Level,
        OPKOR.Flat,
        Column_Name.*,
        OPKOM.ACTIVITY_ID,
        OPKOM.SBU_ID AS SBU_Filter,
        OPKOM.Category,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY OPKOR.project_id ORDER BY CAST(OPKOR.upload_time AS DATE) DESC) AS DRanker
    FROM STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_RAW_STG OPKOR
    CROSS Apply (
                        SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Dry_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Dry Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Final_Coat_Paint_Wet_Area , 'Final Coat Paint - Wet Area'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Stamp , 'Facade Stamp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_MEP_L8 , 'Bathroom Stamp - MEP (L8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Bathroom_Stamp_Civil_L9 , 'Bathroom Stamp - Civil (L9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_MEP_I8 , 'Kitchen Stamp - MEP (I8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Kitchen_Stamp_Civil_I9 , 'Kitchen Stamp - Civil (I9)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_Civil_F7 , 'Dry Area Stamp - Civil (F7)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Dry_Area_Stamp_MEP_F8 , 'Dry Area Stamp - MEP (F8)'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_NOC , 'MEP NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_NOC , 'Civil NOC'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_1ST_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 1ST Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT MEP_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'MEP Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Facade_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Facade Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_1st_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 1st Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Civil_Field_Report_2nd_Insp , 'Civil Field Report 2nd Insp'
                    UNION ALL SELECT SCL_Signoff , 'SCL Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT PNCA_Signoff , 'PNCA Signoff'
                    UNION ALL SELECT Keep_Out_QT , 'Keep Out (QT)'
                        ) AS Column_Name(value,Type_of_work)
    JOIN STG.O_PLN_KEEPOUT_MAP_STG OPKOM
    ON Column_Name.Type_of_work = OPKOM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
        WHERE value IS NOT NULL) KO   
INNER JOIN    DWH.PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM LM 
    ON        KO.LEVEL = LM.LEVEL 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
    ON        KO.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN    [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
    ON      KO.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
     WHERE       KO.DRANKER = 1
   

  ',

query: 'SELECT 
    Upload_Date AS Date,
    P.Sort_ID as project_id,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    tower AS Tower,
    Level,
    Flat_No,
    SM.[SBU_Map_ID] as SBU_ID,
    Apartment_Type,
    ACTIVITY_ID,
    ENGINEER_RESPONSIBLE AS Engineer_Responsible,
    Types_of_Activities AS Activity,
    delay_pln
       ,value_plan AS [Plan]
       ,Count_Pln,
    Predes_value_plan AS Predecessor_Plan,
    CASE 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln = 1 THEN value_plan 
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Pln != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_plan
    END AS Predecessor_Plan_Work_Front,
    Predecessor_Activities AS Predecessor,
    delay_act,
    value_act AS Actual,
    Count_act,
    Predes_value_act AS [Predecessor_Actual],
    CASE
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act = 1 THEN value_act
        WHEN TRIM(Predecessor_Activities) IN ('FROM CTE 1','FROM CTE 2') AND Count_Act != 1 THEN NULL
        ELSE Predes_value_act
    END AS [Predecessor_Actual_Work_Front],
    CASE WHEN Planned_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Planned_SLA END AS SLA_Planned,
    CASE WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE Actual_SLA END AS SLA_Actual,
    Given_SLA AS SLA,
     CASE 
            WHEN Actual_SLA <= 0 THEN     '<= 0'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 1 THEN     '= 1'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 2 THEN     '= 2'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 3 THEN     '= 3'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 4 THEN     '= 4'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 5 THEN     '= 5'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 6 THEN     '= 6'
            WHEN Actual_SLA = 7 THEN     '= 7'
            WHEN Actual_SLA > 7 THEN     '> 7'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Actual_SLA_Title
FROM [DWH].[PLN_VALIDATION_DATA_OUTPUT_FINAL_B_VIEW] PP
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          PP.Project_id=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
     LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          PP.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER

',

query: 'SELECT 
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    LM.LEVEL_MAP_ID AS LEVEL_ID,
     SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    KA.TOWER,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER ,
    'Kitchen Area' as Sclicer,
    KA.FLAT,
    KA.[LEVEL],
     KA.ACTIVITY_ID,
    CASE 
        WHEN KA.VALUE IN ('','NA') THEN '0%'
        ELSE KA.VALUE
    END AS VALUE,
    KA.TYPE_OF_WORK,
    KA.CATEGORY,
     KA.UPLOAD_DATE
FROM (
          SELECT 
               KR.UPLOAD_TIME AS UPLOAD_DATE,
               KR.PROJECT_ID,
               KR.TOWER,
               KR.[LEVEL],
               KR.FLAT,
               COLUMN_NAME.*,
               KM.ACTIVITY_ID,
               KM.SBU_ID,
               KM.CATEGORY,
               DENSE_RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY  PROJECT_ID,KM.SBU_ID ORDER BY   Convert(Date,UPLOAD_TIME) DESC ) DRANK
           FROM [STG].[O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_RAW_STG] KR
           CROSS APPLY (
                          SELECT [KITCHEN_AREA_PLASTER] , 'KITCHEN AREA PLASTER'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_FRAMING_CLEARANCE],'KITCHEN / UTILITY FRAMING CLEARANCE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_FRAMING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY FRAMING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_BOARDING_CLEARANCE],'KITCHEN / UTILITY BOARDING CLEARANCE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_UTILITY_BOARDING] , 'KITCHEN / UTILITY BOARDING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_WALL_TILE] , 'KITCHEN WALL TILE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_BOX_FIXING] , 'MEP BOX FIXING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET] , 'KITCHEN CABINET'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_PLYWOOD] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER PLYWOOD'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_TOP] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER TOP'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_COUNTER_TOP_SKIRTING] , 'KITCHEN COUNTER TOP SKIRTING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_GROUTING] , 'KITCHEN CABINET GROUTING'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_CABINET_SILICONE] , 'KITCHEN CABINET SILICONE'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [MEP_FIXTURES_FOR_KITCHEN_CABINET] , 'MEP FIXTURES FOR KITCHEN CABINET'
                              UNION ALL SELECT [KITCHEN_APPLIANCES] , 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES'
                         ) AS COLUMN_NAME(VALUE,TYPE_OF_WORK)
               INNER JOIN  [STG].[O_PLN_KITCHENAREA_MAP_STG] KM
                    ON          COLUMN_NAME.TYPE_OF_WORK = KM.ACTIVITY_SEQUENCE
               WHERE          VALUE IS NOT NULL
     ) KA
INNER JOIN [DWH].[PLN_LEVEL_MAP_ALL_DIM] AS LM
     ON          KA.[LEVEL] = LM.[LEVEL]
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON          KA.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM] SM
     ON          KA.SBU_ID=SM.SBU_IDENTIFIER
WHERE          KA.DRANK = 1',

query: 'SELECT 
     UPLOAD_DATE,
    P.Sort_ID as PROJECT_ID,
    P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER,
     --PR.PROJECT_ID AS PROJECT_NAME,
    TOWER,
    SM.SBU_MAP_ID AS SBU_ID,
    SBU,
    CLASSIFICATION,
    DESCRIPTION,
    CATEGORY,
    CASE     WHEN ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END          AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN
    ,CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE) AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)=0
               THEN CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE) 
     END AS PR_PLAN
    ,CAST(PR_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS PR_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN) =0
               THEN CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE) 
      END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN
    ,CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL  AS DATE) AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL
    ,CASE     WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY) =0
               THEN CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE)
               ELSE CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE) 
     END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY
    ,CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE) AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE
FROM(
     SELECT
               CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) AS UPLOAD_DATE,
               PROJECT_ID,
               TOWER,
               SBU_ID,
               SBU,
               CLASSIFICATION,
               DESCRIPTION,
               CATEGORY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN)= 1 
                                   Then          FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                           when ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                                   ELSE     UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN          ISDATE(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL)= 1  
                            THEN FORMAT(CAST(ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                    when ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                            ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                         END     AS ISSUANCE_OF_DRAWINGS_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_PLAN)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when PR_PLAN= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(PR_ACTUAL)= 1   
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(PR_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when PR_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS PR_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN)= 1    
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN = 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_PLAN,
               CASE 
                   WHEN  ISDATE(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS VENDOR_FINALIZATION_ACTUAL,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY)= 1  
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS REQUIRED_AT_SITE_BY,
               CASE 
                   WHEN ISDATE(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE)= 1 
                              THEN FORMAT(CAST(ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE AS DATE),'dd-MMM-yy') 
                                     when ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE= 'NA'
                                           then  '01-Jan-99'
                              ELSE UPLOAD_TIME 
                    END AS ACTUAL_DELIVERY_AT_SITE,
               DENSE_RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY PROJECT_ID ORDER BY CAST(UPLOAD_TIME AS DATE) DESC) DRANK
 FROM     [STG].[O_PLN_PROCUREMENT_STG])PR
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PROJECTS_NEW_DIM] P
      ON         PR.PROJECT_ID=P.PROJECT_IDENTIFIER 
LEFT JOIN [DWH].[PLN_SBU_MAPPING_DIM]
SM
     ON          PR.SBU=SM.SBU_Shorts
      where DRANK=1 ',
